snippet: Tuareg rebels have overtaken northern Mali with the help of Islamist groups, and two militants, Mokhtar Belmokhtar and Abdelhamid Abue Zeid, have been the driving force behind jihadism in North Africa.
lead_paragraph: Tuareg rebels have overtaken northern Mali with the help of Islamist groups, and two militants, Mokhtar Belmokhtar and Abdelhamid Abue Zeid, have been the driving force behind jihadism in North Africa.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
